General.Name: Kernel Group Holdings Inc
General.Description: Kernel Group Holdings, Inc. does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, recapitalization, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. It intends to identify, acquire, and manage a business in the commerce enablement, supply chain, logistics and related technology infrastructure sectors. Kernel Group Holdings, Inc. was incorporated in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.
